titles: An answer to a paper entituled The case of the Protestant dissenters of Ireland in reference to a bill of indulgence, represented and argued.
author: Pullen, Tobias, 1648-1713.
Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728, attributed name.
publisher: printed by Joseph Ray at the 3 Nags-Heads in Essex-street,
notes: By Tobias Pullen; sometimes also attributed to Joseph Boyse (cf. Halkett & Laing).
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Case of the dissenting Protestants of Ireland --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
